sourcesContent:
// Theme palette used across the app for dark and light modes
export const themes = {
  dark: {
    primaryBg: '#1E1A18',
    secondaryBg: '#2C2623',
    primaryText: '#F9E4C8',
    secondaryText: '#1C1208',
    accentGold: '#FFD700',
    darkGold: '#E5C100',
    glow: '#F8D173',
    glassBg: 'rgba(30, 26, 24, 0.6)',
    glassBorder: 'rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3)',
    warmBronze: '#8B4513',
    dashboardBg: '#1E1A18',
    sidebarBg: 'rgba(30, 26, 24, 0.8)',
    sidebarHoverBg: 'rgba(44, 38, 35, 0.8)',
    headerBg: 'transparent',
    headerText: '#FFD700',
  },
  light: {
    primaryBg: '#F9E4C8',
    secondaryBg: '#E0D0B8',
    primaryText: '#1C1208',
    secondaryText: '#2B1A0E',
    accentGold: '#B87429',
    darkGold: '#8C5A1F',
    glow: '#F5B851',
    glassBg: 'rgba(249, 228, 200, 0.6)',
    glassBorder: 'rgba(184, 116, 41, 0.3)',
    warmBronze: '#A0522D',
    dashboardBg: '#E0D0B8',
    sidebarBg: '#F9E4C8',
    sidebarHoverBg: '#E0D0B8',
    headerBg: 'transparent',
    headerText: '#B87429',
  }
};
